0010110011101100 1010101100111011 0 -> sum: 1101100000100111, cout: 0
0110101000101100 1101010101100001 1 -> sum: 0011111110001110, cout: 1

1101010001100010 0110101110110001 1 -> sum: 0100000000010100, cout: 1
0011110110011011 1111100111011111 0 -> sum: 0011011101111010, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
